wikipedia_page.main: Ian Wright Seddon (born 14 October 1950) is a footballer who played as a midfielder in the Football League for Bolton Wanderers, Chester, Stockport County, Chesterfield, Cambridge United, Rochdale and Wigan Athletic.He wrote a biography of Bolton and England full-back Tommy Banks.
